message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to discuss the sale of this exceptional product with you. I believe it has tremendous value and I'm confident you'll be impressed once you learn more about it. I'm willing to offer it to you for $1500000. This is a great opportunity to get your hands on this incredible product, and I'm looking forward to hearing your thoughts.
I'm interested in the product, but I think the price is a bit high. I'm willing to pay $1200000 for it. I believe this is a fair price considering the product's value to me.

Thank you for your offer, Bob. I understand your perspective on the price, but I'm still confident in the product's value. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer it to you for $1400000. This is a fair compromise, considering the product's worth to me. I'm eager to hear your thoughts on this revised offer.

I appreciate your willingness to compromise, Alice. However, I'm still not comfortable with the price. I'm willing to pay $1250000 for the product. I think this is a fair price considering the value it will bring to me.

I understand your concerns, Bob, and I appreciate your persistence. I'm willing to make one more concession. I'm willing to sell the product to you for $1350000. This is as low as I'm willing to go, considering the product's value to me. I hope this revised offer is more acceptable to you.

I appreciate your willingness to make one more concession, Alice. However, I'm still not comfortable with the price. I'm willing to pay $1220000 for the product. I think this is the maximum I'm willing to pay and I hope you can meet me at this price.
